title: Liz Truss – 2020 Comments on the UK and Egypt Deal
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Liz Truss, the Secretary of State for International Trade, on 5 December 2020.
content:
This agreement is a clear signal of the UK’s enduring commitment to our close bilateral relationship with Egypt and will help strengthen trade and investment ties in the future.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

It will help provide both British and Egyptian businesses with new opportunities and provide them with the certainty they need to keep trading.
